label: 鍛造
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 55th  . Nara National Museum . 2003
説明文: The process of heating metal and hammering it into shape. Used to make Japanese swords and relief images of Buddhas, among other things. A combination of forging and finishing on a lathe was used for many of the metal cups and containers in the Shōsō-in. [正倉院]
